caption:
Tired of taking endless trips... to the bathroom?🚽
We are delighted that @mollypelletier.rd, a registered dietitian specializing in acid reflux and digestive health, and the owner of FLORA Nutrition, recommends our Trio-Smart 3-Gas Breath Test to her patients!

Molly understands how frustrating it can be to deal with persistent diarrhea and bloating. If you’re not finding answers, it might be time to dive deeper with a comprehensive gut test. Unlike outdated 2-gas tests, Trio-Smart also checks for hydrogen sulfide (ISO), which is crucial because high levels of this gas can lead to Intestinal Sulfide Overproduction. This condition is often linked to severe bloating and diarrhea. 🦠

Testing for hydrogen sulfide helps you get a complete picture of your gut health and ensures you’re not missing anything with standard tests. Once you get your results, you can work with your healthcare provider to create a personalized treatment plan that may include antibiotics, dietary adjustments, or other strategies.

Stop those endless bathroom trips and embrace a more vibrant, enjoyable life! 🌟
